Home.title: Ryan Chen
Home.name: Hello ðŸ‘‹, I'm Ryan.
Home.major: I am a developer passionate about front-end!
Home.currently: I am still continuing to learn React and Next.js related technologies, and I will also use time to learn back-end knowledge.

paragraph.degree: I graduated from Tamkang University in the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering.
paragraph.programming: I am passionate about programming, so I tried a lot of different Programming languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Golang, etc.
paragraph.cause: However, due to university courses, I was exposed to web front-end development. Until now, I still love web front-end development.
paragraph.currently: Now, I am still improving my skills, such as learning React.js, Next.js, CSS typography, etc.
paragraph.addition: In addition, I am also very interested in back-end technology. Like Golang, Node.js, etc.
paragraph.future: So in the future, I will focus on the front-end. If I have spare time, I will also learn more about the back-end technology.

description.muser: This is a simple mp3 player built with Electron and React.
description.react-todo-list: This is a todo list built with React and Tailwind CSS.
description.react-linktree: This is a linktree app built with React and Tailwind CSS.
description.typing-speed: This is a test typing speed app built with React and Tailwind CSS.
description.social-media: This is a social media built with React, Firebase and Chakra UI.
description.github-explorer: This is a github repository explorer built with React, axios, Tailwind CSS, Github Search API.
